# WebPage.FullscreenState

**Enumeration**

The set of possible fullscreen states a webpage may be in.

## Declaration

```swift
enum FullscreenState
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **WebPage.FullscreenState.enteringFullscreen**: The page is entering fullscreen.
- **WebPage.FullscreenState.exitingFullscreen**: The page is exiting fullscreen.
- **WebPage.FullscreenState.inFullscreen**: The page is currently in fullscreen.
- **WebPage.FullscreenState.notInFullscreen**: The page is not currently in fullscreen.

## Interacting with media

- **pauseAllMediaPlayback()**: Pauses playback of all media in the web view.
- **mediaPlaybackState()**: Determine the playback status of media in the page.
- **setAllMediaPlaybackSuspended(_:)**: Changes whether the webpage is suspending playback of all media in the page.
- **closeAllMediaPresentations()**: Closes all media the webpage is presenting, including picture-in-picture video and fullscreen video.
- **fullscreenState**: The fullscreen state the page is currently in.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
